Author: jamesblakemc

Comment: Maybe, but I think that's going to correct itself pretty soon.  Genuinely I think a lot of Republicans just vote that way because they hate how pro-government the Democrats are, which is absolutely fair. Democrats are WAY too pro-government considering literally all of history shows that's not a good idea. But thanks to Trump's horrible policies and inability to run a country we're seeing a shift where Democrats are starting to realize that giving unlimited power to a centralized government body probably isn't the best idea, no matter how enticing the idea may seem.  Either Democrats will move to a new pro-civil rights, anti-federalist party or the Democrats will make that shift themselves. Either way when it happens a lot of people that voted Republican will likely join them because the one thing about the Democrats they absolutely hated will disappear.  I could be wrong and completely misreading the situation. There's also the possibility everyone doubles down and things get far worse. I just like to be optimistic that people aren't that thick headed.
Author: imnota4
